sentences.sContent: It would take him the rest of his life to pay off that loan.
sentences.sCn: 还清那笔贷款将花费他的余生。

sentences.sContent: Sandra was determined to become a doctor and her persistence paid off.
sentences.sCn: 桑德拉决心成为一名医生，她的坚持不懈终于带来了成功。

synos.tran: 付清；取得成功；贿赂；报复

trans.tranCn: 偿清；得到好结果；取得成功
trans.tranOther: If you pay off a debt, you give someone all the money that you owe them
